title: Marital status of the deceased person
question: What was {deceasedName}’s marital status?
optionMarried: Married or in a registered civil partnership
optionDivorced: Divorced or had ended their civil partnership (also known as a dissolution)
optionNotMarried: Never married or never in a civil partnership
optionSeparated: Legally separated (also known as judicially separated)
hintTextMarried: A civil partnership must be registered and is different than living together as partners

maritalStatus.required: Select {deceasedName}’s marital status at the time of their death
